name: S0.1
description:
Designer
Steven Lang

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Fall 2016

Engine
GameMaker Studio

Genre
Platformer

Description
S0.1 is a three level platforming game that follows the story of a small robot. Platforming obstacles, key/door puzzles, and several enemies stand in his way in this game that features a wide range of hand-made assets and levels.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
